headline: ServiceNow & Welltower: Why this strategist is watching the stocks
summary: Tematica Research Chief Investment Officer Chris Versace shares his perspective on two stocks: ServiceNow (NOW) amid its talks to acquire Armis for upwards of $7 billion, and real estate investment trust — or REIT — Welltower, Inc. (WELL). Also catch Chris Versace explain how significant AI usage will be alongside mass adoption by industries and hyperscalers in 2026. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

content.title: ServiceNow & Welltower: Why this strategist is watching the stocks
content.description:
Tematica Research Chief Investment Officer Chris Versace shares his perspective on two stocks: ServiceNow (NOW) amid its talks to acquire Armis for upwards of $7 billion, and real estate investment trust — or REIT — Welltower, Inc. (WELL).

Also catch Chris Versace explain how significant AI usage will be alongside mass adoption by industries and hyperscalers in 2026.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

headline: Analysts Stay Bullish on ServiceNow (NOW) Amid Armis Acquisition Talks
summary: ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW) is one of the 14 Best Large Cap Stocks to Invest In Now. On December 16, Citizens reiterated its Market Outperform rating on ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW) with a price target of $1,300. This decision came after a Bloomberg report that said ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW) is in discussions to acquire cybersecurity startup Armis […]
